amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the title of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the title of the bill to read "A bill to enact the 'Deny Americans the Right to Know Act' or the 'DARK Act'.".

action.text: On agreeing to the Polis of Colorado amendment to the title Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 87 - 337 (Roll no. 463).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Polis.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis of Colorado amendment to the title Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 87 - 337 (Roll no. 463).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Polis of Colorado amendment to the title Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 87 - 337 (Roll no. 463).
